column6:
"THE WINDING WAY",2005,9
All the pieces are in place and all the lies have fallen away. The stage has been set for Nightcrawler's final confrontation with the person who's ripped apart his past. It's a battle to the death, and its outcome could affect not just the world we know, but the dimensions beyond! Part 4 (of 4)!

32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa | colorist:Matt Milla | inker:Jimmy Palmiotti | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Darick Robertson
